medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain began yesterday at 1 PM, initially periumbilical, now localized in the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Patient denies any nausea, vomiting, fevers, or chills. Patient has had normal bowel movements. Appetite has been very poor due to abdominal pain. Experienced an allergic reaction to IV contrast during CT in the emergency department, presenting as facial edema, which is now resolving.
medical_history.family_history: Mother died 4 months ago from breast cancer. Father died of liver cancer.
